required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: the Effect of Broken Ganoderma Lucidum Spore Powder on Quality of Life and Immune Function in Patients With Diffuse Large B-cell Lymphoma After Chemotherapy
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Single Center, Randomized, Double-blind Clinical Study to Evaluate the Effect of Broken Ganoderma Lucidum Spore Powder on Quality of Life and Immune Function in Patients With Diffuse Large B-cell Lymphoma After Chemotherapy

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study was to explore the effect of broken Ganoderma lucidum spore powder on improving the quality of life and immune recovery of patients after chemotherapy. Objective To observe the adjuvant treatment with broken wall Ganoderma lucidum spore powder in patients with diffuse large B-cell lymphoma after standard chemotherapy according to NCCN guidelines. To evaluate and compare the immunoglobulin (IGA, IgM, IgG), T cell subsets (CD3 +, CD4 +, CD8 +, CD4 + / CD8 +), Th1 / Th2 cytokine determination, quality of life score, leukocyte recovery rate, infection rate, infection rate To evaluate the effect of Ganoderma lucidum spore powder in improving the quality of life and immune function of patients after chemotherapy. At the same time, the liver and kidney function and adverse drug events were closely monitored during the study to explore the clinical safety of wall broken Ganoderma lucidum spore powder as adjuvant drug.

primary_outcome.description: T cell subsets (CD3 +, CD4 +, CD8 +, CD4 + / CD8 +)

intervention.description: The experimental group was treated with broken Ganoderma lucidum spore powder after chemotherapy
the control group was treated with placebo after chemotherapy

overall_official.affiliation: 2ndAffiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University, China

facility.name: 2ndAffiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University, China
